{"id":1343373836,"question_id":2,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1722707134,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1343373836/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"N/A","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        vector<int>res1;\n        while(l1!=NULL){\n            res1.push_back(l1->val);\n            l1=l1->next;\n        }\n        vector<int>res2;\n        while(l2!=NULL){\n            res2.push_back(l2->val);\n            l2=l2->next;\n        }\n        int mul=1;\n        int ans=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<res1.size();i++){\n            ans+=res1[i]*mul;\n            mul*=10;\n        }\n        int mul1=1;\n        int ans1=0;\n         for(int i=0;i<res2.size();i++){\n            ans1+=res2[i]*mul1;\n            mul1*=10;\n        }\n        int gh=ans1+ans;\n        cout<<gh<<endl;\n        string h=to_string(gh);\n        vector<int>ko;\n        cout<<h<<endl;\n        for(int i=0;i<h.size();i++){\n            ko.push_back(h[i]-'0');\n        }\n        reverse(ko.begin(),ko.end());\n        ListNode* h1=new ListNode(ko[0]);\n        ListNode* tem=h1;\n        for(int i=1;i<ko.size();i++){\n            ListNode* temp=new ListNode(ko[i]);\n            tem->next=temp;\n            tem=tem->next;\n        }\n        return h1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
